page.title: 12ST. JOHN THE DIVINE
page.content: St.Johns Church is an Anglican church built in 1866.It cost 20 000 pounds to keep the church running last year.The 9.15.am.Parish Family Mass is the most popular service.On Sunday about 300 people go to the services and during the week up to 50 people go to the various other services.There are about 3 Weddings and 5 Baptisms each month. The choir is all male and is made up of 14 boys and 8 men.Apart from 18 weekly services the priest Father Jefferies takes Holy Communion to the sick, teaches the Christian faith, prays and helps people.This church has a large membership but Father Jefferies says, 'The church doesn't set out to be successful like a business, it sets out to be like Jesus and to show the love of God.'
